item.title: Dependability
item.description: Forgive, don't forget Feel good, no regrets Learn a little bit by bit And each day you'll add to it There's 4 DBs for each blob Use a tool to run all jobs Up and at 'em day by day This and that sir, service say... What's a here or there deployed? Costs uncertain, cheapness avoid! But clean up each time you're done

item.title: Puzzles Are Puzzling
item.description: Puzzles are puzzling, don't you agree? Edges and notches and colors all free About on a table or worse on the floor A puzzle that's puzzling is all but a bore Each piece of the jigsaw knows well its own place But she who can't find it must bear the disgrace Of placing each wrongly the first go around For all four sides matching's not easily found

item.title: A Design Philosophy
item.description: I object to objects Terse as they may be Made of state and actions I'll claim subjectively Just a box of buttons Colored by their caller Bounded by opaqueness Bound for plans of squalor Black is not a color Any caller truly knows Every object sees its context And its boundaries come to blows Once a moat was dug around

item.title: Blue Jean Gypsy
item.description: Buh bah da da daa da Buh bah da da daa da Buh bah da da daa da Buh bah da da daa da Swing it boys, the band's gonna burn up this club (Oh yeah, oh yeah!) Grab a drink, relax, let the melodies flow And before you know It's gonna be a fabulous show C'mon let's hear that saxophone go

item.title: Cursed
item.description: For years my field would flourish With a million bolls of white Each summer I'd grow cotton And we'd pick it until night We found our place on Earth On a lot that God had granted He blessed us with great harvests From the seeds that we had planted One year we saw some trouble Damn boll weevil caused the blight

item.title: Self Restoration
item.description: There's something in me bottled up It's amorphous, swimming around My soul and guts, my white and black matter It's rising to the surface, grasping for air Pressuring the vacuum seal to break Day and night it lingers, lingers, lingers It's been years since last I wept And felt my most sincerest self Habits change, memories remain Tonight I'm sweating through my sheets

item.title: Puddle
item.description: Specks of light glinter on the water's surface As I close my eyes in meditation Breathing deeply, warm air fills my lungs Drifting inot the lake's call of calmness Minutes pass as air goes in and out Feeling more aware of life around me Fish are swimming, bees and birds are singing An old man is whistling on the dock Separating from the world around me

item.title: Times Like These (For George Floyd)
item.description: At times like these I want to shout And get all of my anger out I'll let the Earth absorb my wrath And scare those standing in my path At times like these I want to fight To show my enemies I'm right I'll wager war and bet I'll win A bargain for my next of kin At times like these I want to loot

item.title: The Survivor
item.description: What waves that were rolling and splashing ashore What winds that were raging the coastline that day What ocean gargantuan, waters that tore Their houses to rubble, their homes washed away The fires that burned in the forests so dry The flames in the country continued for weeks The damage was dealt and the families cried As smoke filled the air over valleys and peaks

item.title: To the Point
item.description: Back in the 50s, one man had a great message. He heard it from his father when he was a kid, and it shaped the way he viewed the world. When it was time for college, a war was raging overseas. He knew he could make a great impact by sharing his message. He would clothe the needy, show the lost God's Way. So he studied theology

item.title: Titles
item.description: Life as it happened today, led me to smoking a bowl So some say unkindness is always my way, Were I to yield, I'd be yielding... so what? I can't say since I am uncertain my pay, How to make better verse, a better made way Towards I/O Pins, and make more true say. There's some things that haven't been learned yet, there's mysteries out in the world

item.title: Grey Mind
item.description: My room with some light Cast from many angles Where they land and where it goes So some becomes more Something and something else Tile and grout Wall against will Twisting in fractals Approaching themselves And away from some simultaneously Smaller and smaller connections Closer and closer, denser and denser Left and right All my neighbors So the synapses evolve where quanta resides

item.title: An Ode to Park Funding
item.description: The ocean is salty And ships are at sea If the lighthouse were open How happy I'd be But funding is missing We're locked out today We can't scale the lighthouse Cause Congress won't pay

item.title: Non-profundities (from a Macbook)
item.description: Most are a fan of far-fetched funny thoughts Some are well versed in profundities Some more get a kick out of anything Like me; I am fond of non-profundities What is it like to enjoy almost anything? Any a thing and a thought come to mind Except for pain and the loss and depression That once was my default, but I did subside

item.title: The Soldier
item.description: The soldier follows orders He does not question his commander His job is well defined - do what you're told He has no inherent direction, No goals or aspirations He is a machine, ready to be programmed When his training is complete, he can operate without fear or doubt. His goals are not his, they are predetermined. His general calls the shots, he simply aims and pulls the trigger.

item.title: My Mantra
item.description: Life is beautiful Listen to music Play, Grow Work hard, work out Eat healthy Learn from others Be gracious Love is out there

item.title: While True
item.description: I haven't done so and such in a little while What's a once in a while that is any more than a little? It must be a long while, longer than the littlest little while A cardinality all its own, an infinity of sorts Discovered once a moment Infinitesimally summed across a minute Integral to all we've been through All we'll be through
